replies.body: Love that knights are getting slowly better but could you please stop Garen from spinning in the middle of nowhere? I've lost so many fights because of my Garen spinning in place while getting hit by rangers. The fact that he moves while spinning on rare occasions makes it all that much more frustrating.
Agree I've been avoiding Garen because of this. It's so annoying watching him spin on nothing while enemies he would take out just kill him bc he's over a unit away. lol

This does absolutely NOTHING to stop people rushing gunslingers, spending all their money on them without any strategic thinking or E-con, and blatantly just grabbing on hit items and winning against EVERY comp.

They even win when there are multiple people PER LOBBY running gunslingers, using all their money early to get them. its just RNG about who hits that lv 3 graves or trist first and gets their shrink. 

a 20% chance to shrink my unit and make its damage, hp and overall usefulness HALVED is trash.

I just think that it's more the item than the gunslinger strat. 
Shirk, is as status that does not belong in this game all together. Spending time and money investing in a unit, only to have it taken down to a tier one is beyond frustrating. The item only works 'effectively' on attack speed champs and lowering it's chance only makes it non effective on anything but attack speed.
..maybe it the shirk status wasn't permanent it might solve the current issue we all face? But I still vote to 'change it to something else.
